name: Shellers.io
description:
Blast your way to victory in Shellers.io - the ultimate instagib game featuring machine learning bots, random map generation, and a futuristic sci-fi setting. In this fast-paced deathmatch game, players are equipped with energy shields on their backs that provide protection from enemy fire. These shields can be powered up by scoring kills, but will also power down when hit by enemy attacks.

Navigate through dynamically generated maps as you compete against other players in intense, competitive matches. Use your quick reflexes and strategic thinking to outmaneuver and outgun your opponents.

----

Game was made for 7dfps game jam and it took us a bit less than 2 weeks to develop it. At this point it's an early prototype, and future will tell what becomes of it!
